name: Smog Solutions Inc.
description: Smog Solutions Inc. is a leading environmental technology company dedicated to combating air pollution and improving urban air quality through innovative solutions. Founded in 2015, the company specializes in developing advanced air purification systems and products designed to reduce smog and other harmful pollutants in urban environments. Smog Solutions Inc. utilizes cutting-edge technologies, including smart sensors and AI-driven analytics, to monitor air quality in real-time and implement targeted interventions to mitigate pollution levels. The company's flagship product, the Urban Clean Air System, has been deployed in numerous cities worldwide, contributing to cleaner air and healthier communities. In addition to hardware solutions, Smog Solutions also provides consulting services to municipalities and organizations on air quality management and sustainability initiatives. The company's mission is to create a cleaner, healthier planet by advancing technologies that foster sustainable urban living and improve public health.

seo.meta_title: Smog Solutions Inc. | Leading Air Quality Improvement Technologies
seo.meta_description: Explore Smog Solutions Inc., a pioneer in environmental technology focused on air purification and pollution reduction. Discover innovative products and our commitment to cleaner air.

faq.question: What does Smog Solutions do?
faq.answer: Smog Solutions specializes in developing technologies and products to combat air pollution and improve urban air quality.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Smog Solutions?
faq.answer: Jessica Liu is the CEO of Smog Solutions Inc.

faq.question: Where is Smog Solutions headquartered?
faq.answer: Smog Solutions is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Smog Solutions?
faq.answer: The main products include the Urban Clean Air System and smart air quality sensors.
